ygData.subject: Re: Verant's approach to bug fixes (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes that s Brad s standard excuse. However, even if we grant this, we still have to ask when the programmer that s working on the other zone warping bugs,
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Dec 03/99, "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...> wrote:
> From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
> Um. I would not call this "going to any length" That warp has been there a
> LONG time. I am glad to see it finally fixed.
> Also, they probably have differentprogrammers working on different things.

Yes that's Brad's standard excuse. However, even if we grant this, we
still have to ask when the programmer that's working on the other zone
warping bugs, and the zone bounceback bug between qhills and w karana is
going to finally finish his fix. After all, both these bugs have been
there and reported since beta. Maybe they could assign those bugs to the
programmer who is so diligent and fast at fixing those bugs that
actually are slightly convenient to players instead of the bugs that
completely disconvenience and annoy players.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
